column5: Hi all,    BASIC TRAINING FOR JACK IS GOING VERY WELL!  <object width="480" height="385"><param name="movie" value="
Cool.. get em out while they are young..
Yeah, my thoughts exactly TJ, will be taking him out ice fishing this winter for sure!
That's great! I think we need to get my son Ryan and Jack together for a play date on the water. The 35 hour round trip might be a bit of a challenge though.
Now that would be cool KF!  But yeah...the trip sounds like a marathon!
Pretty soon your son will be steering the boat and you will be sitting at the front. Nice video. Looks like he will have his own charter business.
